HediffDef.label: Race: Sun Elf
HediffDef.description: Stereotypical elitist elves who feel they are superior to most other races. Stats - Increased Movement Speed - 115% Pyschic Sensitivity - 90% Overall Health - 80% Mining Speed - 120% Learning Factor - 120% Negotiation Ability Extra Info - Naturally Beautiful - Never Undergrounder - Doesn't mind Rough Living
